This is the Silverlight redistributable package for DotNetZip v1.9.  Packed Sat-08-06-2011-215945.06.  There is an assembly for BZip2, one for ZLIB/Deflate/GZIP, and one for Zip, in the Release folder, and debug builds of the same in the Debug folder, for a total of 6 DLLs.  You need to reference exactly one of those DLLs; which one depends on your application requirements. If you have any questions, please check the forums on http://dotnetzip.codeplex.com/discussions
